summary: Lots of minor changes, bug fixes, and performance enhancements in this update! There are a few new features, settings, and other changes as well. See below for details.

details.title: Better Items
items: Improved performance of hover item views
Added support for more journal entry types

details.title: Better Journal
items: Added Highlight rare mice feature, currently only highlights Black Widow
Improved Journal Loot List parsing and added more supported entries

details.title: Better Mice
items: Improved performance of hover mouse views
Added support for more journal entry types

details.title: Location HUDs - Table of Contents
items: Updated sim to scroll to expected volume
